Colombia and Panama Free Trade Agreements

May 14, 2013
“Colombia and Panama FTA’s in Latin America: Realities and Opportunities” will explain the realities and benefits of the U.S. free trade agreements with Colombia and Panama. In this webinar you will understand intricacies of doing business in the market, and hear from Senior Commercial Officers at the US Embassies in these markets. You will also find out about commercial opportunities and how to finance them. Download the full video (223 Mb)
